.design

UI/IxD/Visual Design

In my experience, the a scalable presentation layer (SCSS/CSS) is part of what a digital designer would deliver. I thoroughly enjoy bouncing back-and-forth from VSC to Figma and developing design documentation that includes reuasble and flexible figma assets as well as tokenized style values.

Collaboration with global contributing UX designers • Audit • Project management around library, components, templates, core UI styles and brand • Distribution • Figma library management • Tokenization of branded styles (style dictionary)

Front end design & platform implementation

Lead efforts to develop and implement a design-agnostic front-end framework that supports the creation of multiple websites from a core set of reusable components and supports unique branded themes on AEM. lead team of front end developers, manage codebase repo on GitHub, document front end development workflow processes, including testing criteria

Styles are modular, where the specificity is namespaced by the component's root class name. Additionally, component styling can include variation styles and classes to be applied throughs style system.

Data visualization

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).
